filter.name: default
filter.value: uuid in (:uuid) and siteID in (:siteID) and controllerID in (:controllerID) and name like '%:name%' and productName like '%:productName%' and ipAddress like '%:ipAddress%' and adminState like '%:adminState%' and source like '%:source%' and owner like '%:owner%' and nativeID in (:nativeID)
